class.name: PlatformEntity
class.comment: Storage of the platforms. With a platform several procedures can be grouped or in the case of citizen science the platform can be the camera or mobile phone. An example of a platform is a vessel that has multiple sensors (Procedure). In most cases, the platform is the same as the feature or procedure, such as a weather station or a water level location.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the platform which can be used for filtering. Should be a URI, UUID. E.g. http://www.example.org/123, 123-321

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the platform identifier, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name of the platform.

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the platform name, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description of the platform

set.name: parameters
set.comment: Storage of relations between platform and related parameter

column.name: fk_platform_id
column.comment: The reference to the platform in the observation table

column.name: fk_parameter_id
column.comment: The reference to the parameter in the platform parameter

column.name: fk_platform_id
column.comment: Reference to the feature table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the platform

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the platform
